Tucson takes a seat next to Vestige, knowing that to explain everything wou=
ld mean taking the time to do so in a personable manner.

" It all started =
not too long ago.  I had been working with Lord Perseus, a commander of the=
 Maximals of Atlantis, we left, and happened upon a planet, where we came i=
n contact with an old Maximal base.  From that base, I learned of what had =
happened to my commander, and comrade, Rodimus Prime.  He had been abducted=
 by Hydras, and turned against his faction forcefully.  I heard of what hap=
pened and I knew I had to begin my own quest to try and recover Rodimus, no=
 matter if I was destroyed in the process while doing so.  I traveled to th=
e Black Fortress, where I had learned the whereabouts of Dark Rodimus, who =
was Rodimus but reprogrammed into a darker figure and turned into a slave o=
f Lord Hydras.  It was a long battle, and at first, I did not succeed.  I w=
as rescued myself by a tiny Maximal, named Rat Trap, who I could see desper=
ately needed a friend, and in saving me, he found one and so did I.  He cal=
led for backup and I was recovered by Lord Elder, a leader of a Maximal gro=
up.  He had faithfully guarded the Autobot Ark until such time that an Auto=
bot would return to restore what was lost.  It was there where I was lead t=
o the body of Optimus Prime, and it was there where the Matrix of Leadershi=
p granted me it's power and I was given the power of the Primes.  Now, befo=
re this, I was known as just Tucson, an average Autobot, who fought faithfu=
lly in the wars, but suffered a great defeat which left me visually impaire=
d even today.  But for some reason, right now, it seems to have corrected i=
tself. "

He shifts his weight and then begins to tell the rest of the tale=
.

" That leads me to your question Vestige.  When I was at the Black fortr=
ess, I released a bolt of energy from my spark, which supposedly was suppos=
ed to heal Rodimus of any possession that Hydras may have had over him.  No=
t at first though.  He had recovered a small fraction of his old self but w=
as quickly overcome by the evil once more.  But it was not until he had sen=
sed something within him that he made the change back to his normal self.  =
So, we all began to proceed out of the Black fortress, only to be entrapped=
 by another enemy.  An enemy which was insectile, and arachnid in nature.  =
Rodimus told me to run, and at first I did, but in my spark I knew I could =
not abandon him.  So, I went back and proceeded to search for Rodimus along=
 with my comrades.  Once we found him, he was bound by countless numbers of=
 dangerous tendrills, and the only way for me to save him, was to lend my s=
park in efforts to save his.  And that is how I got here.  I will do what e=
ver it takes to recover Rodimus. I lost him three times, I will not lose hi=
m again.  I could have fought the arachnids, but I saw something disturbing=
 in them.  Their colors, they were the same as Rodimus Prime's..  The brigh=
t reds, oranges and yellows of his armor and vehicular form.  There is more=
 to defeating the evil than meets the eye and perhaps you may be able to te=
ll me about this place, and from there I can compile a strategy to get Rodi=
mus back.  I don't want to make any foolish moves if I don't have to."

---=

 well just became a commander. I'm very good friends of Optimus Prime, and =
comrade to Rodimus Prime. Here, see? I have the Autobot insignia. I won't h=
urt you, I promise. I'm actually willing to help you, if you'll let me."

t different than the legendary commander of the Autobots. His body language=
 matches that of Optimus, as does his gentile demeanor.
>

es as he approaches is what appears to Alpha Trion in
> size and body shape=
, however as he approaches he can see that the
> colors are red and yellow =
with little to none of the blues that
> decorated that venerated transforme=
r.
> 
> His voice is a little different as well as he watched Tuscon with
>=
 careful optics and then spoke, "You are a Prime?" the figure said as
> he =
lowered his weapon. As the figure's arm drops Tuscon can see the
> Autobot =
sigil on the figure as well. "I am Vestige." he said, his
> voice raspy and=
 rough. "How did you get here?"
